name: Rock Solid (Defal, nessieco)
description:
Rock Solid is a game where you play as a Rock Golem called Dwanye, and help them to escape the unstable cave, knowing that you will need to rock trough puzzles opening doors to save your life! But be careful! Dwanye is an unstable Rock Gollem, meaning that if they go too fast, they will fall apart!

This game was made for the LD49 (Ludum Dare 49) by Defal, nessie, Pequeno_Preto and Rossi

Instructions:  Move - AD   Jump - Space   Drop - E
